Package net.minecraftforge.client.model.lighting

Klasse FlatQuadLighter

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.client.model.lighting.QuadLighter
net.minecraftforge.client.model.lighting.FlatQuadLighter
public class FlatQuadLighter extends QuadLighter
Implementation of QuadLighter that lights quads with flat lighting.
